files.title: docpkg Cheatsheet
files.description: This document provides a cheatsheet for using docpkg, detailing installation commands, core commands, AI workflows, and supported source formats.

aiSections.title: Quick Start
aiSections.summary: Instructions for installing docpkg and initializing a project.

aiSections.title: Core Commands
aiSections.summary: A table of primary commands with descriptions for managing documentation sources.

aiSections.title: AI Workflows
aiSections.summary: Commands for generating search indexes and creating context bundles for AI use.

aiSections.title: Source Formats
aiSections.summary: Defines various source formats supported by docpkg, including NPM, Git, HTTP, and local files.

files.title: Author Cheatsheet
files.description: This document provides a cheatsheet for authors on how to use `docpkg` for distributing documentation with AI-ready metadata, covering preparation, optional AI enrichment, and distribution methods via Git and NPM.

aiSections.title: Preparation
aiSections.summary: Instructions to create a manifest using `docpkg` by running commands in the repository root.

aiSections.title: AI Enrichment (Optional but Recommended)
aiSections.summary: Guidelines for configuring and running AI enrichment to pre-compute summaries and tags for documentation.

aiSections.title: Distribution
aiSections.summary: Steps for distributing documentation via Git and NPM, including commands for committing and publishing necessary files.

files.title: Consumer Cheatsheet
files.description: This document provides a comprehensive cheatsheet for using `docpkg` to manage documentation dependencies in projects, covering setup, installation, usage, and maintenance.

aiSections.title: Setup
aiSections.summary: Instructions for initializing `docpkg` in new or existing projects.

aiSections.title: Install Docs
aiSections.summary: Guidelines for adding documentation sources and syncing/installing from configurations.

aiSections.title: Use Docs (AI)
aiSections.summary: Details on bundling documentation for AI tools, with options for filtering.

aiSections.title: Maintenance
aiSections.summary: Commands for listing, updating, and removing installed documentation packages.
